DOC.detailed_description: The study design randomize , 4-way single-blinded cross-over intervention study . The participant randomize individually order shall receive 4 test meal . There implement standardize lunch include respectively 1 ) Light/alcohol-free ( Tuborg Super Light 0,1 % alcohol ) , 2 ) Regular lager ( 4,6 % alcohol ) , 3 ) Strong beer ( 7,2 % alcohol ) 4 ) control drink without alcohol energy content ( carbohydrate protein ) average beverage ( `` sportsdrink '' ) . Besides 330 ml test drink , test meal consist grill cheese sandwich ( Tulip Food Company ) amount toast adjust accord type drink serve meal , content macronutrients meal . The study include 16-20 participant , randomize order receive 4 test meal washout period least 6 day test day . Upon arrival test person ask urinate ( baseline sample ) , 1st visit weigh , height measure body composition ( bioimpedance ) measure . After rest briefly , baseline blood sample take blood pressure measure ( 1st 4th visit ) . 45 minute start test meal first postprandial blood sample take , 45 , 120 180 minute . Urine collect 0-90 min , 90-180 min 3-24 hour test meal . Participants provide container equipment purpose , must submit sample ongoing basis Dept . Nutrition , Exercise Sports .
